title: Phanteks P600s - This One is Different!
description: The Phanteks P600s silent PC gaming computer case has finally arrived.  It is based off the super impressive Evolv X but it improves on airflow and a number of other elements.    A special thanks to ALL of our CES 2019 sponsors:  Phanteks Razer Corsair MSI  Thermaltake  Subscribe    As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (from Amazon):  Main 4K Camera -  Main Lens -  Main Camera Mic -  Second 4K Camera -  $700 4K Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #ces2019 #phanteksp600s #hardwarecanucks #phanteks
